series_title: Applications: Disabled Parking Plates or Placards
series_description: This series documents applications for disabled parking plates or placards and agency actions in response to those applications. This series includes, but is not limited to: applications (MED-10 and MED-11), approvals, disapprovals, medical certifications, correspondence, and other supporting documentation
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents applications for sun-shading or tinting films and agency actions in response to those applications. The series includes, but is not limited to: applications, medical authorization (MED-20), removal certification (MED-21), medical certifications, correspondence, and other supporting documentation
retention_statement: 5 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents the identity and personal information of citizens and businesses that request DMV vehicle information prior to purchasing vehicles. Request histories are retained for use by agency investigators, state and local law enforcement and the FBI to auto theft and title fraud activity. This series includes, but is not limited to, applications (CRD 1) and other supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year
